name: DREAMART VR
description:
Dreamart VR is the direct interpretation of a dreamworld.

The player resonates with the mere subconscious thoughts of the virtual character.

The game consists of multiple scenes. Each Scene is directly or indirectly correlated to the previous scene, thus it unfolds the potential of a deep non linear VR experience. More Scenes are to follow soon!!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

++++ This should now also work with SteamVR :) ++++  

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

E.N.J.O.Y
